meta.title: The Rise of Panama’s Digital Economy & E-Commerce
meta.notes: Market size, platforms, wallets, entrepreneurship programs, and forward-looking trends. Figures include verifiable stats; disputed claims captured under `claims`.

highlights.title: First local online banking launches
highlights.text: Banco General states it was the first Panamanian bank to offer online banking (circa 2000).

highlights.title: Bank-led wallets & instant transfers expand
highlights.text: Yappy (Banco General) becomes the leading P2P and merchant wallet; ACH Xpress broadens instant bank transfers.

highlights.title: Nequi exits Panama
highlights.text: Nequi ceases operations in Panama on Dec 31, 2024; users migrate to Banistmo channels.

wallets.name: Yappy
wallets.notes: Moved US$9.5B in 2023 through Banco General’s digital channels; 68% of BG transactions were digital (2024).

wallets.name: Nequi (Panamá)
wallets.notes: Users could migrate to Banistmo Cuenta Express.

wallets.name: Listo Wallet (gov benefits)
wallets.notes: Used for programs like PASE-U / IFARHU disbursements.

market_size_usd.estimation_method: Statista DMI / ECDB coverage as reported by La Estrella + ECDB sample page

key_platforms.name: Mercado Libre
key_platforms.status: Regional marketplace used by Panamanians (no dedicated .pa domain).

key_platforms.name: Encuentra24
key_platforms.status: Active classifieds & marketplace; acquired OLX ops in CA.

programs.name: Startup Weekend Panamá
programs.status: Recurring global program with local editions

items.notes: UTP & UP offer e-learning; MOOCs accessible via global platforms.
Telehealth legal framework (2021) and MINSA program expansion in 2024–2025.

items.topic: IoT and analytics in logistics (Canal & ports)
items.notes: Ongoing digitization, predictive analytics use cases around the Canal and logistics ecosystem.
Rising wallet use and contactless growth; digital payment rails via Telered/ACH.

media_suggestions.title: E-commerce share of retail (2018–2024)
media_suggestions.notes: Use ECDB range (5–10%) for 2024; avoid hard 2018/2022 % unless independently verified.

claims_or_to_verify.why: Recent ECDB shows online share 5–10% in 2024; 22% in 2022 appears inconsistent.
claims_or_to_verify.suggested_action: Replace with ECDB’s 5–10% range for 2024 or license Statista series to validate 2018–2022.

claims_or_to_verify.why: No official monthly ‘digital buyers’ count located; proxied by market size and internet users.
claims_or_to_verify.suggested_action: License Statista ‘Digital Buyers in Panama’ or ECDB users KPI.

claims_or_to_verify.claim: Fintech investments reached US$15M in 2023 (+35% YoY).
claims_or_to_verify.why: No authoritative country-level VC/fintech total found; avoid without LAVCA/Crunchbase deal list.
claims_or_to_verify.suggested_action: Compile deal-level list from LAVCA/Crunchbase; cite totals.
